column4: im trying to compile an application and it says it requires glib 2.6 or greater and that i dont have glib... How do i get it? sudo apt-get install glib was a no-go
whats the program you are trying to compile?
You need one thats newer then the version in the repos?
use sudo apt-get builddeps irssi   command   to pull in all needed developer files for it.
the DEV files are not installed by default.
you will need to install several things to compile stuff besides just the 'build-essential' package.
i said it may be build-deps. try tab completion :)
is theres some reason you need a newer version of irssi then whats in the repos?
